timeline.bodyText: We already have the localDestination method on InputFileDescriptor that does this I think.
timeline.author: nedleitch

replies.bodyText: Thanks. I was the one who put it there :)
replies.author: jonbaber

timeline.bodyText:
My fondness for regular expressions has its detractors but in this case I think something like this makes for a tidier implementation:
return String.format("'%s'", expression.trim().replaceAll("^'", "").replaceAll("'$", ""));
timeline.author: nedleitch

replies.bodyText: That is much nicer. I have always avoided regular expressions in Java because apparently it is slow but of course it doesn't matter here. Nice tip. Thanks.
replies.author: jonbaber

timeline.bodyText: Nit: String.format might make this easier to read.
timeline.author: nedleitch
